questions: Is there an old man in a fabric smock splattering paint in the image?
Is there a young man in wooden goggles and an oversized t-shirt in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: an old man in a smock splattering paint alongside a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles?
Is the smock made of fabric?
Are the goggles made of wood?
model_output:
yes The image shows an old man wearing a blue plastic smock and splattering paint with his hands.
no The image does not contain a young man wearing wooden goggles; instead, he has colorful safety-like goggles and an oversized t-shirt.
yes The image displays both an old man in a blue protective smock splattering paint and a young man standing beside him wearing an oversized t-shirt and goggles.
no The smock appears to be made of a plastic material rather than fabric.
no The goggles worn by the young man are not made of wood but appear to be made of plastic and other materials.
